mapper.select: SELECT friend_id, auth_register_user.id, username, email, phone, first_name, last_name, level, active_time, last_online_time, auth_register_user.create_time, device_model, rom_version, ui_version, gender, icon, profile, bvision, btv FROM ld_relation_friends, auth_register_user WHERE ld_relation_friends.user_id = #{userId} AND ld_relation_friends.friend_id = auth_register_user.id AND ld_relation_friends.approved = 1 ORDER BY auth_register_user.username
SELECT friend_id FROM ld_relation_friends WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND approved = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO ld_relation_friends (user_id, friend_id, approved) VALUES (#{userId}, #{friendId}, #{approved})
mapper.update: UPDATE IGNORE ld_relation_friends SET approved = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND friend_id = #{friendId}
mapper.delete: DELETE IGNORE FROM ld_relation_friends WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND friend_id = #{friendId}
